TEST_NAME: Pages should avoid inline CSS for blinking or animation logic
QUERY_CLOB:
with aap as (select case
                 when (lower(trim(inline_css)) like '%blink%'
                       or lower(trim(inline_css)) like '%animation%') then 'N' 
                 else 'Y'
                 end pass_yn,
                 page_id,
                 inline_css,
                 created_by,
                 created_on,
                 last_updated_by,
                 last_updated_on,
                 build_option,
                 page_mode,
                 page_name,
                 application_id,
						     workspace
          from apex_application_pages a)
select aap.pass_yn,                          
       aap.application_id, 
       aap.page_id,
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) has inaccessible css: `%3`', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id,
        p3 => substr(aap.inline_css,1,50)) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2)has inaccessible css', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id) issue_title,
       aap.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aap.page_name,
       aap.page_mode,
       aap.inline_css,
			 aap.workspace
from aap
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aap.application_id
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: WCAG 2.0/2.1 - 2.2.2 Pause, Stop, Hide - 2.3.1 Three Flashes or Below Threshold
